posts.body:
4fag here.
Some vpns pass. Mostly those from weird small island nations, or there is that Iranian who used Eesti vpn servers.
Google captcha is cancer. Could be a chinkmoot plot to force us to buy passes, but who knows.

Yeah, yeah. We know. Slide threads everywhere.
Jannies are pozzed, and we have a constant flow of newfags who can't stop themselves from engaging in bait bukkakes.

>>a211dd76-fe6b-44ca-bff8-372d9a1ffe32
Jews are less than 3% of the population, yet disproportionate part of pedophiles are Jews.

posts.subject: You Guys are retards
posts.body:
Barely anyone seeds anything!
everything never loads because all files have 0 seeders.
Just imagine you're a Russian pirate who's seeding all their pirated games torrent on the pirate bay.

I try to seed as much as I can, but if there's a way to automate that someone post it here.
How can I delete this thread without muting the ID? Or is that how muting works?

>>f2f4e3a1-2d80-443c-9ece-dbe9a21b5cbc
Just how can I automate this instead of clicking [Seed] on everything?

>>2153dcbd-9fc1-477f-a093-8f038d977f72
Yeah, is there a way I can just shoah a thread with a click?

>>bc5d6ea7-d345-4f95-9e9f-9022d135381a
Yeah, pressing mute once will delete the thread off your PC, and then you're asked if you want to mute the user forever.

>>443b51c0-4cb9-4311-bef4-c4d38e6e9655
>both identities can be linked by the segments of the board that you advertised you had to the other clients.
Why wouldn't be assumed that it is another user? And I doubt that there is a files list sent to everyone, but rather a request for a file. ZeroNet would have been stupidly inefficient and slow that way.
Someone would have to have an updated list of every ID's list of files they own, and constantly update it. There is already over 13GB of data here, so if you multiple that by let's say 2000 IDs with 13GB, that's 26,000 GB or about 25.39 TB after everyone seeds everything. This list is also constantly updating and changing. Someone needs a huge database, and work with tons of assumptions. Heck writing something that does that would cost CIA boomers their yearly allowance.

Given enough time, there might be a sequence of data that can identify every one of us, but even still, I don't think feds or the CIA have the autism to do that. The fucking feds kept the (you)'s in their report.

Besides, you can just go delete a couple random files every now and then.

>>a0ce9f0c-1f0f-4f6a-9ea1-f276a5e2db56
Good. Now they know that they can't get rid of 8chan.

>>ba559eaa-d3c9-4ad7-8afe-dca0c461f208
>His reasoning? "...Radicalization will drive us further away.."
I don't think he truly believes this. Doesn't sound like a really good reason, and might have just said it for his center or center left viewers to buy.

>>d2db2775-92b1-412c-bc15-4b0047ed7ba6
If you have Tor enabled, they can only know that you're using Tor.

>>1d51fbd0-d62b-4247-b722-ee4a35f43215
>use VPN first then TOR
Can't stress this enough. You're mentally retarded if you connect to your VPN through Tor.

>>89ce5dda-2fa8-46c6-a7b8-6af2f14d3de3
>4chan 
Same. Never made the 8 switch, but now I am here to seed.

>>22e69444-97c9-4026-b415-9c1331234746
>Anarcho-capitalism is one guy.

>>67ce0812-df1a-4150-91a8-757259350527
Click on its full name, and it will ask you if you want to black list it.

>>444e4253-5553-40ff-a7e2-639f40c285a6
Look her up. She's an Iraqi Jew who has a private intelligence company, in 2015, claimed that a twitter user of some alleged ISIS guy that called for attacks against individuals and events was a high ranking member of ISIS, when the feds found out it was an American Jew running the account.
https://www.smh.com.au/national/australian-is-jihadist-is-actually-an-jewish-american-troll-20150911-gjk852.html

>>1e9e87a3-3eb6-434e-b458-7dbf3739bf18
It will probably end up just like 4chan.

>>c7efbd2c-9a13-4386-b72d-73436fbefd25
>1. Mute button on the catalog
>2. Ability to hide threads and posts without muting an user
>6. Research seed ratio based proof-of-work for posting, which would allow decentralized anonymous posting without additional CPU usage
>19. Add pinktext support

Also, one more note.

As of now, anyone not connected to a VPN or using Tor to post here is declaring their IP and what they own, so to mitigate or eliminate that without sacrificing a lot in speed is a crucial step in this site's future.

Is it possible t hash IPs at some step that will truly anonymize everyone?

If not, is it possible that instead of pseudoanonymity we have now, the IPs get shuffled? Every peer will act like a spokesperson of another peer. They won't declare their IP, but only what that peer owns, and then download requested files to memory and send them over. Nothing is stored in the hard drive. 

So, every peer will act as a relay for another peer which will increase bandwidth use, but is kind of anonymous.

So, the first thing a connected user will do is look for a relaying peer. Every peer they ask will accept if they aren't already hosting for someone. If they are hosting, they will decline. Once the newly connected user runs out of peers to ask, they will ask again previously asked peers.
The first one they ask will have to check with others how many they are hosting. If one person is hosting two, they will decline. This is to prevent exploitation of the system since you can only have odd or even number of users connected, there cannot exist more than 1 peer who dual hosts.

If a user disconnects, they will connect whoever they are hosting to the peer who was hosting them.

This is only applied for uploads. I don't think it is necessary for downloads, but correct me if I am wrong.
It will be as if everyone in a hall just switched IDs with someone else. If there are plenty of people connected, it will be hard to pin down everyone's IP.
Maybe randomize relays and peers every now and then as well.

>>a35efd5c-1a54-4f0c-8c79-4a7ba3a75553
>One vote per ID please.
Just take the first on my list.

This is great. I just muted all pedos here and now no matter how often they post, I see nothing, I have nothing, and the board is clean on my end.
Mute button is god.

Sometimes, when I am bored, I browse my zeronet users data folder. Just looking for any folder with a decent size of around 1mb or more, and see what data there is.
Some of you guys are very active. Like 1GB+ of content here, and it is mostly porn.
But man, there is also tons of gold webms and such you guys upload, it's as good as browsing here without the need of an internet connection. It's awesome.

You guys might need to do that. I also found some cp that I had to purge. I thought I blacklisted it all, but some sneaks up on ya.
If you're not using the tor browser to get here, I'd suggest you do.
